## \_StudioInitializeOpts.usePersistentStorage property

Whether to persist the changes in the browser's temporary storage. It is useful to set this to false in the test environment or when debugging things.

Default: true

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
usePersistentStorage?: boolean;
```
